pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, September 10, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion at the Women in the World Summit.

TELUS Centre for Performance and Learning
273 Bloor Street West

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to present themselves at the media check-in no later than 11:00 a.m.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion moderated by journalist Katie Couric with Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund Christine Lagarde at the Women in the World Summit.

TELUS Centre for Performance and Learning
273 Bloor Street West

Notes for media:

    • Pooled coverage from centre position
    • Open for cut away
    • Media are asked to present themselves at the media check-in no later than 12:30 p.m.

7:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Fortune Live Media dinner.

Museum Room, Shangri-La Hotel
188 University Avenue  

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
